general.gigTitle: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Creative Website Developer I WordPress I WIX I CMS Expert
sellerCard.description:
Greetings, Fiverr Community!

I'm Jhuma Akter, an expert website developer with over 6 years of experience crafting high-quality WordPress & WIX websites. Since 2019, I've specialized in building websites from scratch to an advanced level, customizing premium themes to match your brand's unique identity and features. 

Whether you need a business website, portfolio, blog, or online store, I'm here to turn your vision into reality.

Let's create something amazing together if you're ready to bring your business to life with a professionally designed website! 

Message me now to get started!

description.content:
Are you seeking a professional WordPress developer to create a unique, functional, visually appealing website that perfectly aligns with your brand identity?


Hold on! You'll get a one-stop solution here!


I'm Jhuma Akter, a leading WordPress web-site developer on Fiverr. With over 6 years of practical experience in WordPress Website Development, I developed 500+ stunning websites around the GLOBE.



My Services Include:


  • Completed Functional Web-site Development
  • Attractive Layout with Color Combination
  • Fully Responsive Design
  • SEO Friendly & Speed Optimization
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • Setup Any Payment Gateway
  • Redesign Existing site for Better Looks
  • Live Chat & Bug Fixing
  • Social Media Integration
  • Site Transfer to Another Domain or Hosting



What Sets Me Apart?


  • High-Quality Work
  • On-time Delivery
  • 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
  • 24/7 Support/Free Consultation



I use industry-leading tools like Elementor, Divi, Astra, and other popular themes and plugins to develop stunning, responsive, and highly functional WordPress web-sites.



Still, Have Questions? Feel free to message me anytime to book a free consultation and Get a breathtaking site that propels your business forward.

slide.name: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog website

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to build a WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need your WordPress admin or hosting/Cpanel login details, reference website links, or the design and content of your website, including text, logo, images, videos, etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see some of the work you've done on WordPress?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, just send me a message. I'll show you samples of my earlier web design work.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you customize or redesign an existing WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, sure! I can customize or redesign an existing WordPress website based on your instructions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website on WordPress be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sure, your website will be super responsive across all devices (smartphones, tablets, and desktops).

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer customer support after completing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer 30 days of free customer support after completing the order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be SEO-optimized?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, your website be SEO-optimized. I'll develop your website by following Google's SEO best practices.

reviews.comment: Jhuma exceeded my expectation by delivering a beautifully  designed website,  that looked even better than my referenced site. This project took a little more time, mainly because of my lack of preparedness. She is so patient and polite!  I will definitely recommend her to all the aspiring business women in my group,  and will be working with her again!!!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for appreciating my work and keeping a close eye on my services that will be my pleasure.

reviews.comment: This project took much more time than expected. In the beginning, it was devastating to see the result was completely different from my expectations and the information I provided. Despite that, Jhuma and the team were very patient with all the changes and worked together to deliver a result that was as close as possible to my expectations and desires.

seller_response.comment: Outstanding Experience! Thank you so much for choosing me as your service provider.

reviews.comment:
We had an excellent experience working with Jhuma. She was incredibly responsive, always replying promptly to every inquiry and addressing all of our concerns in detail. She patiently made every change we requested, ensuring that the final result matched our vision perfectly.

Jhuma redesigned our website, and we are very pleased with the outcome. Her creativity, professionalism, and attention to detail were outstanding, resulting in a design that is both modern and user-friendly.

Her dedication and customer-focused approach made the entire process smooth and stress-free. We will definitely be using her services again in the future. Highly recommended!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for your continued business and communication. Let me know if you need anything in the future.
